alerts.name: Exception Trigger Detection
alerts.description: Detects when the CrashController is triggered, resulting in an exception.
alerts.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE appName = 'PetClinic' AND path = '/oups' AND httpStatus = 500
alerts.rationale: A triggered exception might indicate improper handling in the application flow that needs immediate attention.

alerts.name: High Error Rates
alerts.description: Tracks transactions that result in 'HTTP 500' errors, indicating server-side issues.
alerts.query: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE status = '500') FROM Transaction WHERE appName = 'PetClinic'
alerts.rationale: High error rates could significantly degrade user experience and imply the need for debugging.

alerts.name: Slow Get Requests
alerts.description: Monitors performance of distinct service endpoints to detect slow GET requests.
alerts.query: SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction WHERE appName = 'PetClinic' AND httpMethod = 'GET'
alerts.rationale: GET requests taking too long denote potentially poor performance which users will notice.
